EN: I lie dreaming in a silent sanctuary

Blasphemy! Rank blasphemy!
Thou crawler! Thou cringer! Thou smallest of the small!
By what right dost thou trespass here, in this home of the Gods? Shrivel away and begone! Begone!
Temporary tuning device built of carapace.

"Inspired or mad, those ancient bugs. They devoted their worship to no lord, or power, or strength, but to the very darkness itself."
- Lemm

Device that resonates with beings of great power.

Glows bright upon defeating mighty foes.
....Gods of Our future. Seek thee, We shall... To devote Our all...
Dreamborn god of fear and relief

FREE CONTENT PACK 03

ORIGINAL RELEASE DATE: August 2018

DESCRIPTION: Take your place amongst the Gods in an epic celebration of Hallownest's Glory and the final chapter of the Knight's journey.

New Character and Quest - The Godseeker arrives. Break her chains and aid her in an ancient duty.

New Boss Fights - Hallownest's greatest warriors raise their blades.

New Game Mode - Long requested and a classic for the genre. Complete the Godseeker's quest to unlock the new mode.

New Music - All new soaring boss tracks and giant remixes of beloved classics.

Most holy! Most divine! O God of Gods! Thou return to test thineself upon the lowly, snivelling weaklings serving beneath thee.
Permit Us then to bow and scrape as bugs impotent before thy glory. We wouldst give Our all to witness again but a moment of thine terrible might!
Intruder amongst the gods of Hallownest
O Gods of Hallownest, show Us your might! We shall attune Ourselves to thee and ascend ever higher!
My Knight... At last you are freed.

"Sagely God of the cunning and bold,
Sharpen Our nails and show Us the odds,
O greatest of masters, We wish to behold,
That one still greater, the God of Gods!"
- Prayer to the Sage
Such magnificent scale, even in decline. If only thee could teach Us to grow so large...
An honour, Seeker, to attend your call!
I lie dreaming at a wind-blasted peak
God of Gods, thou stride atop these lesser things as though they were but mortal bugs. Truly, thou are the one We sought. Our tune rings rich with thine brilliance.
Dreamborn god of travellers and sages

An offering? Yes. The Crawler makes an offering to Us. Rare bloom, tiny and pure. No God, though. No godliness. But still...<page>What does Crawler ask for in return? To touch? Our thick, gleaming hide? To see? See the exquisite face beneath Our mask? Such strange prayers!<page>No. No! Crawler presumes too much. The gift is Ours. Kept by Us. But Our mysteries will be preserved.
Hallownest... Even fading, a glorious land of Gods.<page>Never. Never! The Gods here will never die!
Creep on, meagre one, and may the Gods utterly destroy thee!

Taken from the Queen's Gardens. It glows faintly with pale light.

The flower is very fragile and will be destroyed if you take damage or ride the Stagways.
We watch over a village of warriors

Ah, what precious gift it offers, though alas I shan't accept.<page>Not of me that flower, nor of this kingdom. Far it travelled to reach this place, brought by one beloved, fair knight of lands serene.<page>There is rare power hidden in those frail petals.<page>To hold it so close, one must surely be unaware of its nature...

Lowly brute! Blindest of worms! Again thee challenge the Gods? What divine whim has granted thee the strength to endure their presence, where no others may stand?
Fight then, struggle then, and keenly shall We listen for thy destruction!
Mother's glow... so angry... so angry...
I lie dreaming at the edge of the world
A cocoon chained with a simple lock.
Do you haunt my dreams... Or I yours?

Gla gla... Mother...
Am I... Mother...? Gla gla...
This odd creature is unaffected by and unaware of the disease drifting through the caverns. Its madness is all its own.
Talented god of artists and creators
Not bug, nor beast, nor god.
What is a god, if not an artist?
I protect the weak in the heart of the crossroads
We lie dormant, guarding the Spire's peak
I lie dreaming amongst peaceful graves

Thou return to cross thine nail with this pure vessel. For what purpose, We can only wonder.<page>Does combat draw thee closer together? Dost thou also desire attunement with the Gods? Or dost thou hide some other desire deep within thee?

Thou art painfully persistent! Why dost thou defile this pantheon with thine presence? Seek ye glory, o vain one?<page>Thou misunderstand Our purpose. Through ritual combat are We attuned to the voices of the Gods.<page>Ever higher do they lead Us! Higher and higher and higher! Until through Godly focus do We attain communion with that great power sleeping in the Kingdom's heart...
I lie dreaming patiently in a garden
Skilled and respected master of the nail. Always eager to learn new things.

"O God inspired, master of arts,
Whose works shall eternal endure,
Peer beyond Our minds and hearts,
Reveal to Us the God most pure!"
- Prayer to the Artist
Device that resonates with beings of great power.
Seek the gods of Hallownest. Tune their power. Through their strength, ascend.

These markers are new additions to the shop. You can use them to record interesting spots on your map!

The colour is quite soothing, don't you think?

Gla! Wualala!Mother! M-mother! Gla gla gla! Little sisters... grow grow grow!Gla gla... Mother...
Am I... Mother...? Gla gla...
Broken shell of an empty god
Sleeping God, to see thee as thou once existed, with land and dream and devotion, We would give our mind...
I guard the heart of the hive for my Queen

What is this? Do you think it becoming for a pupil to drop rubbish in their master's home? Or is this gaudy flower your idea of a gift?<page>I've no use for such things. Take it with you, or else I'll toss it outside to be eaten by vermin.
I await the lighting of the lantern
Creeper. Dost thou see it? Shining. Brilliant. Our Godtuner.<page>Thou covet the Godtuner. Desire beyond desire! Take it then, for We have ascended beyond it. No need for such an instrument.
Challenge the Gods of Hallownest. Take your place at their peak.

Show reverence, o meagre one. Show fear! Thou approacheth a great and terrible God.<page>Though its worldly body be bound and defiled, the glory of its pure form endures, ruler of this pantheon. Its endless power shall attune Us to the one greater still, a God of Gods!<page>Meagre one, dost thou imagine thyself the equal of this God? Dost thou imagine thyself made in its image? Thou assume a similar shape, and the deep echo within thee seems familiar...<page>Ahh! What thoughts are these? Thou sow blasphemies in Our mind, wretch! Begone! We pray that the God of nothingness silence thee forever!
Gla gla... Mother sends treasure... Gather it up...
Complete the Pantheon of the Master
I serve my Queen inside her dreams
Rare artifact from a time before Hallownest, its spires twined in a unified form.Contains a large amount of liquid from the Abyss, perfectly still.

Mischief beyond mischief! We can not escape thee, even in this highest, most distant of pantheons.<page>O wielder of nail, o eater of Soul. Are thee a messenger of the Gods... or something stranger?<page>We will not defy thee, continue thy combat. We shall be listening closely...

"Gods of Thunder, Gods of Rain! Why forsake thy servants? Will Our minds be left suffering, to ache alone? What God remains to deliver Us from this woeful silence?"
- Lament of the Godseekers
Talented god of artists and creators
Complete the Pantheon of the Sage
I await you at a Pantheon's peak

"Gods by toil and nail bound,
Brothers sworn to guard the weak,
Masters of the sacred ground,
Help Us find the God We seek!"
- Prayer to the Masters

"Inspired or mad, those ancient bugs. They devoted their worship to no lord, or power, or strength, but to the very darkness itself."
- Lemm
I sleep in the deep caves below the world
I rest amongst crystals and strange machinery

A cocoon chained with a simple lock.
Use simple key?
Savage! Intruder! No right thou hast to trespass within such sacred memory. Begone! Begone!
Point your nail at the thing you seek!
Use of a controller is highly recommended
Thou art no God! Begone, pretender! Be silent!
Pale mother... We barely dare to think. The chance of meeting is too rare.... but thine resonance! Could you be one of Them?

These markers are new additions to the shop. You can use them to record interesting spots on your map!

This colour could be useful to remind yourself of hard-won battles.

Woe! Thou Speck! To achieve victory, even if only against mere imprint of that most brilliant deity. Thine battles proves strength enough to impress.
But couldst thou ever hope to overcome that mighty God tuned at the core of dream and mind, when met in perfect state, at peak of all others? We think not!
I watch over lush pathways and distant ash-swept graves
I wait, weapon in hand, within the colosseum
We bequeath our all. Our shell. Our mind. We are naught but vassal before thee, o glorious God of Gods!

Even long departed, We feel the afterglow of the God-power that sat this throne... It lays heavy upon this kingdom.<page>That lingering power alone was beacon enough to draw Us to Hallownest. How bright it must have been to mortal bug stood before it.
Sleeping God, We can barely feel thy presence amongst the green left behind. What strength thee once possessed fades beyond time and tune...
Complete the Pantheon of the Knight
Kindly god of bravery and honour

Why hast thou crept into this pantheon, o meagre one? The noise of thine wriggling creates much discord, drowning out the godly resonances we attune Ourselves to!<page>Dost thou mean to thwart our sacred goal? Dost envy drive thou to such madness?<page>We pray that the Gods of this Kingdom punish thee, obliterate thee, utterly destroy thee!
I call out to no one, hidden by roads and highways

Ahh! Will the Gods not relieve Us of this troublesome speck? How it tests Us, seeing this worm raise its filthy weapon to the Gods!<page>Thou hast luck beyond luck, o speck! The Gods of this pantheon, for purpose beyond Our understanding, allow you amongst them.<page>Truly, the divine punishment they must be planning for you will be beyond all reckoning. Prepare thyself! Prepare thyself!
Aged fluke, grown fat on the rich refuse found in the pipes below the capital.
Thou return to this pantheon, though thou hast already ascended to its height?<page>Be this some strange way of drawing thyself closer to the Gods? Or do thee test thyself for sport?
Dreamborn god of faith and betrayal
Activate if experiencing controller issues. Requires restart of game.

These markers are new additions to the shop. You can use them to record interesting spots on your map!

The material I used for this colour is quite rare, so it costs a little more.
What gods, to save Us of Our silent mind?

MAJOR UPDATE

ORIGINAL RELEASE DATE: March 2018

DESCRIPTION: Hollow Knight is refreshed and refined alongside its console debut.

A Kingdom Rebalanced - Hallownest’s many denizens receive countless tweaks and changes.

New Boss Fight - Challenge the ferocious knight-protector of an ancient queen.

Bosses Upgraded - Some smarter, some harder, one receiving a suite of new moves.

Map Markers - An extra tool in your cartographic journeys. Place them anywhere on your maps to remember a point of interest, a difficult foe or an item just out of reach.
Change language in the Main Menu
Strange mask from a godless land, passed down over time. The design suggests the wearer's thoughts were focused through the crest.
Press a button on the controller or connect a new controller to activate
Together we hunt in paths overgrown with green
O majestic one, We beg thee reveal thyself! Our mind is so much less without you in it...
Loyal protector of the Hive's Queen. Flightless but ferocious in battle.
False god conjured by the lonely
Taken from the Queen's Gardens. It has been destroyed and is now worthless.
I await you at a Pantheon's peak
Little Ghost... What dreams we share...
Deceptive god assuming a protector's form

This game saves data automatically at certain points.
Please do not turn off the software while this symbol is displayed.
Restless god of those who band together
Seek the God of Wealth and Power
Seek the Gods of Nail and Shell
Tuning... An art, difficult. Never perfect. We, the ones below, We bond Our strength to the world. Follow what We give... listen for the Gods. Resonate. Attune!
Together we stand at a Pantheon's peak
Revered gods of a proud tribe
Noisy... Gla gla... Scary up up... Stay here, gla...
Safe, gla... Little Sisters... Gla gla...

"Deepest silence in holy shell,
Given nail and named a Knight,
Bound by chain and egg and spell,
Hear Our plea! Reveal thy Light!"
- Prayer to the Vessel
Together we stand at a Pantheon's peak

Thou most ungrateful of blemishes! The Gods in their great mercy allow thee to escape their first pantheon alive, yet still thee think to test thineself against their might?
Doom thyself then, that We may resume Our focus and ascend Our minds ever higher!
Are we all seeking something different?

Ahh, you're awake, and looking well-rested!<page>I was startled when I woke to find you curled up beside me, but of course you're welcome to rest here whenever the world wearies you.<page>As the King granted his kingdom to shelter those who needed it, I offer my home. Stay as long as you like, down here where it's cosy and warm and moist.
Forgotten champion of the Colosseum, drawn away by strange obsessions.
Dreamborn god of meditation and isolation
Gods. Many shapes, they assume. This bloom, then? A splinter? Cast-off? Refuse of something greater?<page>No. No tune. If it sings... We can not hear it.
Gla! Gla! Strange thing... lurking... waiting? Gla gla!<page>Mother's treasures... too scary, gla. Go away, gla gla!
This empty god stands at a Pantheon's peak
Rare artifact from a time before Hallownest. Contains a drop of liquid from the Abyss.
Some creatures are born with duties and loyalties marked indelibly upon their minds. They are strong, but they are also slaves.
Complete the tale of the Grimm Troupe
I lurk at the peak of a forsaken tower
Continue thy combat, o stranger, continue thy ritual. We shall be listening closely...
Show in-game messages when completing a quest.
I sleep submerged in the depths of the archive
I defile the gardens of false royalty

These markers are new additions to the shop. You can use them to record interesting spots on your map!

This understated colour makes me think of hunting for treasure...

Gods. O Gods! Thy nature, mysterious. Uncanny. Even so for We who seek!<page>By attuning Ourselves We clutch at their greatness, their immortality. Their unknowable splendour.<page>Hallownest. This kingdom is blessed with true Gods. True! All around, the corpses of pretender Gods. But! Not in Hallownest...

What draws thee here, Crawler? Faith? Fear? Or do thee also seek the Gods?<page>Here. Heart of the Kingdom. We listen for them here. But some Gods are distant still. Must be awoken.<page>Take the Godtuner and seek ye the Gods! Seek! That they may find their way. Tuned to mind. Tuned to home.<page>Reward. As reward for thine services, ye shall be allowed to linger here. Linger and gaze. Linger and gaze on Our magnificent shell. Our overpowering beauty!

Creeper. Did thee wake Us?<page>Revived, this kingdom. These Gods, tuned and bested, gleaming in mind. Bright. Sharp.<page>...And this? Our form swells? Large? Nay. Immense. Majestic. Hibernation, so long forced upon Us, yet the shell that results is strong... So strong!<page>Thine gaze is adoring. Ye must think Us Godly. Amusing, foolish. But thou art faced with enormity and beauty, true...

Wretch! Thou hast ordained thine own destruction!
Through sacred combat are We attuned to this Kingdom's greatest beings. By entering this gate thou hast challenged the very Gods of this Kingdom!
Dost thou consider thyself the equal of this pantheon, of its masters? Draw thy weapon then, fool of fools, and be damned for thy arrogance!
I keep guard above a verdant land
When predators are too successful the surplus food they eat becomes soft bulk wrapped around their bodies. Still, these creatures at least seem to make good use of their additional weight.
Loyal brother gods of the nail
Brothers of the nail, trained in combat by the Great Nailsage.
I lie dreaming in darkness, surrounded by predators
Legendary sage of the nail arts and, recently, merchant of some success.
I haunt the halls of a sanctum
Punish this shell, o God of Gods! Blast Our frail, worthless form to ash. We welcome thine fury! Desire beyond desire!

My cave may seem a far cry from the finery of the palace but even still the memories of my former comrades, and our glorious King, remain fresh in my mind.<page>The Pale Court was a wondrous place full of the age's greatest heroes. Ahh! Looking at you now, I can easily imagine you standing amongst them.
Ascend the Pantheon of Hallownest and take your place at its peak
A God so strong... Yet erased so completely. How could it happen?
God protector of a fading land

What a curious specimen. Hah! Though even its pure aura is no match for the light of our dear King.<page>Keep your faint flora, bug. I've enough of my own to tend and surely you'd agree that mine are far finer.
Defeat the Hollow Knight and complete the game.
I lie within a maze of pipes
For me! For you! For King!

FREE CONTENT PACK 01

ORIGINAL RELEASE DATE: August 2017

DESCRIPTION: The dreams of Hallownest take shape.

2 New Bosses - Leap into battle with mighty new foes.

2 New Tracks - Stirring boss themes for each giant encounter.

New Upgrade - Dream Gate. Discover a whole new method of traversing Hallownest.

A New Stag Station Uncovered - One station was walled away, hidden from bugs and forgotten by stags, until now.

God of Gods! How clear to see. How obvious. That diminutive shell doth barely disguise thine overwhelming strength, thine all-consuming glory!<page>Shame beyond shame! We failed to percieve such obvious truth. Punish us, o Devourer! Crush us! Rain nail and lash on Our pathetic being. We welcome such divine vengeance!
Rare artifact from a time before Hallownest. Volatile liquid of the Abyss writhes within.
I lie dreaming in the wastes
Together we are chained in a strange colosseum
Achieve 112% game completion and finish the game.

FREE CONTENT PACK 02

ORIGINAL RELEASE DATE: Halloween 2017

DESCRIPTION: Take part in a twisted ritual that stretches the breadth of the kingdom and bestows the player with a powerful new ally.

New Boss Fights - Face off against a dark master and a twisted scarlet spectre.

New Charms - 4 new charms granting unique new aids and abilities.

New Enemies - Devilish rivals to test your nail and spells against.

New Friends - Befriend a whole new bunch of weirdos, including one who offers a very special service for dedicated players.

New Music - Spooky and spine tingling tracks by Christopher Larkin.
I hone my craft at a Pantheon's peak
I protect the pipeways of the kingdom
I wait patiently in a dark nest of predators
O bound one, thy silence nearly deafens Us. Foolishly we feared thee, yet only by thine providence shall We find the one We seek. The God sleeping within...

"Inspired or mad, those ancient bugs. They devoted their worship to no lord, or power, or strength, but to the very darkness itself."
- Lemm
It's the greatest power, isn't it?
Can it see me? Can it smell me? Ohhh, Mother!
God-king, you reduced your form to match Our meagre shells... But why shed so majestic a whole?<page>Surely, your true immensity could have inspired devotion all the more!
Chosen vessel, raised and trained to prime form.
Whatever it takes... I'll prove myself!

Crawler. Grand, strange Crawler. Favoured plaything of the Gods! Our mind is filled with the strengths of this kingdom. Rich. Bright. Clear.<page>Thou have attuned thyself to the many Gods of this land. Much power. Perfection? Thine? Perhaps even a match for our glorious shell...
Gla gla... Grow and grow... Nice and wet...

That instrument you hold. It is an aid built for seekers, one bound to our mind.<page>It's a grand boon to receive so fine a device, and dangerous even, for us to allow it part.<page>That instrument lays much of our mind bare. Accept it then as our faith in you.<page>Scour this land. Gain mastery over beings of great power and it's beacon shall respond.
Lover gods of faith and devotion
Ahhhh, that smell! So strong, so virile, but not the odour that calls to me.<page>I crave a different smell. Precious. Sensitive... Fragile. Ahh! Bring it. Wear it!
Hallownest. This kingdom is blessed with true Gods. True! All around, the corpses of pretender Gods. But! Not in Hallownest...
Complete the Pantheon of the Artist

Continue playing without a user?
Your progress will not be saved
Thou can not linger here, o coward of cowards! Step forth, and receive thine holy punishment!
Dost thou understand Our words? Will thee allow thyself to be destroyed by the God of this pantheon? Will thee allow Us to resume Our sacred attunement?
These winds carry Us to thee, dear Gods...

O Gods of Hallownest, graciously thee open the way to this greatest of Pantheons! Thy voices grow closer and thy resonance draws Us ever higher!
Pray will We, Attune will We, until that spark of divine light shines from the deepest darkness!

O tragedy! This majestic god evades Our attunement with such ease.<page>We live only to serve the gods, to seek them out. Why does she frustrate Us? How does she hide from Us? Does she diminish herself by choice?
Where will the line of Hallownest's Great Knights end? With me? Can such a thing be passed on?
